meanings.sent1: She felt uneducated because she never went to school.
meanings.sent2: The uneducated man struggled to read the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The uneducated chicken tried to lay eggs in the flowerpot.
meanings.sent4: His uneducated mind was a closed book to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The uneducated forest was a mystery to the young explorer.

meanings.definition: Not having knowledge or information on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The uneducated student had no idea how to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: She felt uneducated about the latest technology trends.
meanings.sent3: The uneducated cat tried to meow like a dog.
meanings.sent4: His uneducated guess turned out to be surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent5: The uneducated book left the reader confused and lost.
